original_text: Also, that the soul be without knowledge, it is not good; and he that hasteth with his feet sinneth.
korean_text: 지식 없는 소원은 선하지 못하고 발이 급한 사람은 잘못 가느니라

sentences.original_text: Also, that soul be without knowledge
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 그 영혼이 지식이 없는 것은

sentences.original_text: and he that hasteth with his feet
